alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pennington County through 545 PM MDT... At 501 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Reptile Gardens, or 3 miles south of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, southern Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Black Hawk, Caputa, Rapid City Airport, Bear Country, Hart Ranch, Black Gap, Reptile Gardens and Thompson Butte. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 55 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
